attributes.action: Move the bail hostel for sexual offenders from Aldridge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have recently found out (after my daughter was assulted) that around the corner from our house is a bail Hostel.Although we always knew it was there we didnt realise that the majority of offenders were that of a sexual nature and have had to sign the register. This is very worrying as there are several schools nearby and children that walk around the estate, not knowing they are at risk!!!!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Move the bail hostel for sexual offenders from Aldridge"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18231


Prime Minister's Office
